original_text: Then Jesus turned and he spoke only to his disciples. He said to them, ‘Be happy because of the things that you are now able to see and understand.
korean_text: 제자들을 돌아 보시며 조용히 이르시되 너희가 보는 것을 보는 눈은 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: and he spoke only to his disciples
because of the things that you are now able to see and understand
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이제 보고 이해할 수 있는 것들 때문에
